name: Bantha
Lore: 'Transport, pack animal. Many breeds of different sizes and colors. Three meters tall. Can go weeks without food or water. Found throughout the galaxy.',
Text: 'May carry 2 passengers. Bantha ability = 1/2. May move as a ''react'' only to a battle or Force drain (if within range). Each Tusken Raider at same exterior site is power +1.',
